description: Rex begonia (Begonia rex-cultorum 'Super Curl') is amazing for its stunning foliage coloration and uniquely sculpted leaves. This shade-loving plant has stunning leaves that are usually bright green, with patches of silver, pink, and red. The 'Super Curl' cultivar tends to have more intense coloration and the elongated, curly leaves look almost sculpted. Its showy blooms, soft to the touch, come in a variety of shades, ranging from pink to white. Rex begonia is incredibly hardy, making it an easy choice for a variety of gardens. It's a standout addition to any shady area, and its unique colors and sculptural leaves are sure to make an impact.
